attributes.action: Increase benefits and universal credit by £100 per month
attributes.additional_details: The government are currently not providing the stability needed financially. We need to make a change.
attributes.background: Low income can lead to many issues it can be physiological, affecting one's metal health leading to anxiety and depression. It is also physically difficult to navigate poverty, families to feed, bills to pay it doesn't stop. With climbing prices, it is very important we help those who need it most.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626542
